columns.name: projAchievementAgainstOutcome
columns.description: Where applicable, refer to the 'Key Threat(s)' and 'Monitoring Methodology' sections of the MERI Plan and Project Services to show how your activities support the stated outcome and align with the identified investment priority. Include any adaptive management actions planned for the project outcome at mid-term.

columns.name: programLogicAssumptions
columns.description: This question asks you to reflect on how well the assumptions outlined in the Project Logic - whether previously tested through evidence or still unverifiedâ€”contributed to achieving the intended outcomes. Consider both the relevance and accuracy of these assumptions in practice.

columns.name: projOutcomeAchievement
columns.description:
• Fully Achieved = Outcome measure achieved,
  • Mostly Achieved = half or more of the outcome measure achieved,
  • Partially Achieved = Less than half of the outcome measure achieved,
  • Not Achieved = Outcome measure not achieved.

dataModel.name: outcomeProgress
dataModel.description:
• Fully Achieved = all MERI plan outcome statements were met as planned,
  • Mostly Achieved = at least half of all MERI plan outcome statements were met as planned,
  • Partially Achieved = less than half of all MERI plan outcome statements were met as planned,
  • Not Achieved = none of the MERI plan outcome statements were met as planned

behaviour.condition: "No" == keq2

dataModel.name: keq3
constraints: Governance and accountability with well-defined roles and responsibilities

dataModel.name: keq4
constraints: Governance and accountability with well-defined roles and responsibilities

behaviour.condition: "Yes" == keq6
"Yes" == keq7
"Yes" == keq8

items.source: A final outcomes report (designed for RDP Panel projects) to assess a projects short or medium term outcomes (dependant on duration) at project finalisation.

1.1 To what extent did you achieve the MERI plan outcomes for your project?*
Reflecting on each of the project outcome statements in your MERI plan, please specify what your project achieved over the reporting period, as well as the degree to which the planned outcome(s) for this period were or were not achieved.

columns.title: Supplementary Questions
columns.helpText: Additional  questions to support outcomes at the program level

columns.title: What did the project achieve against this outcome statement?
To what extent were the Program Logic assumptions, both tested and untested, accurate in supporting the outcome statement?
The degree to which the project outcome was achieved

items.preLabel: 1.2 Considered collectively (based on previous responses in table 1.1), to what extent are you progressing towards the short-term project outcomes?
Provide any additional comments about the projects progress to date here.
KEQ1. To what extent has the project increased knowledge of best practice NRM for the investment priority(ies)?
KEQ1.1 How?
KEQ2. Were the methods/strategies used the best way to achieve/maximise project outcomes at mid term?
KEQ3. What factors contributed (enablers) to the achievement of outcomes for the investment priority(ies)?
KEQ4. What factors limited or prevented (barriers) the successful delivery of outcomes for the investment priority(ies)?
KEQ5. Has the projectâ€™s risk assessment and risk management remained appropriate and effective at project mid point?
KEQ5.1 Why?
KEQ6. Did your project engage with traditional owners?
KEQ6.1 If yes, how?
KEQ7. Have there been any unexpected or unintended (positive or negative) changes or other outcomes delivered by this project?
KEQ7.1 If yes, what are they?
KEQ8. Did this project receive funding and/or in-kind services from any other sources apart from the Australian Government program?
KEQ8.1 If yes, please specify source and the proportion of funding and/or the type and quantity of in-kind services contributed to the project.
KEQ9. To what extent has the project achieved the desired behavioural change and ongoing commitment among the participating land managers/owners towards the investment priority?
KEQ9.1 How?
KEQ10. How will the outcomes be maintained beyond the life the project? (refer to project assumptions if applicable)
